32 template<typename T>
33 bitpit::IBinaryStream& operator>>(bitpit::IBinaryStream &stream, T &value)
34 {
35  stream.read(value);
36 
37  return stream;
38 }
39 
47 template<typename T>
48 bitpit::OBinaryStream& operator<<(bitpit::OBinaryStream &stream, const T &value)
49 {
50  stream.write(value);
51 
52  return stream;
53 }
54 
55 namespace bitpit {
56 
62 template<typename T>
63 void IBinaryStream::read(T &value)
64 {
65  read(reinterpret_cast<char *>(&value), sizeof(T));
66 }
67 
73 template<typename T>
74 void OBinaryStream::write(const T &value)
75 {
76  write(reinterpret_cast<const char *>(&value), sizeof(T));
77 }
78 
79 }
